Team Goals

Here is a list of major deliverables for each team:

  • Biblio Engine: A working bibliographic engine for searching DevOps publications.
  • Build: A fully automated build process including things like menus and porting from static to Django sites.
  • Cloud: The ability to deploy our sites into the cloud at the "push of a button."
  • Coding A: Robust Python checking implemented with MyPy and PyLint.
  • Coding B: A Django course framework up and running.
  • Coding C: Integration between Classes and our courseware.
  • Coding D: Maximal web site checks performed before release, including spell checking.
  • Deployment: The ability to duplicate our site with code, either on a laptop, on a server, or in the cloud.
  • Monitoring: Site monitoring in place for all three of our sites.
  • Security Secure the use of Django authentication and the Classes API.
  • Testing: Jenkins or Travis in place as part of our build pipeline.
  • UX: A clean, easy-to-use interface for our web sites.
  • Workflow: The work of all other groups made visible and easily managed.
